reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic value, great quality
reviews.reviewText: The optical cables work perfectly. The free USB light included is a nice touch. People who complain about sound quality don't understand how digital cables work. They are probably the ones who would buy gold-plated HDMI cables for better image or sound quality. These cables work as well as the ones you would buy for 20 times the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight cable eases stress on the port
reviews.reviewText: Got this cable to use with a broken port on my TV. The heavy cable I had been using wouldn't stay fastened, even when taped. (The port's door had snapped off and the port itself cracked.) This cable fit snugly, although, as expected, it still needed to be taped. I also tied a line to the TV's mount to keep the cable end lifted in the right orientation. It works well, and is a less expensive and less of a hassle solution than the alternative of repairing the motherboard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Priced well, good replacement cables
reviews.reviewText: Xrmai 2 PCS Digital Optical Audio Cable 6ft1.8M - [24K Gold-Plated, Ultra-Durable] Slim Optical Cable Digital Audio Cable for Home Theater, Sound Bar, TV, PS4, Xbox, Playstation & MoreThe two packs of digital audio cables come simply packaged in a Ziploc-style plastic bag. I like that they have shipped the cables with a cover over the optical end, to protect them from dirt and dust during shipping. The jacket on the cables is definitely thicker than the old one that this is replacing, and it seems that it would protect the optical cable. Well. There's not a whole lot to say about optical cables, they worked just fine, were fairly inexpensive, and I am pleased with their operation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Two working optical cables and a free LED light to help plug the cable in correctly (handy if there is not a lot of light at the back of the PC etc.).If you are not experienced in using optical cables, do remember to remove the clear shipping protectors at *both* ends of the cable. The image shows the cable with one protector removed and (as a point of comparison) one not removed. Do not attempt to use this cable unless both protectors are removed -- the cable will not work and inserting the cables with the protectors in place will probably damage the equipment. Enough said.I have no idea why the complaints concerning the diameter of the cable and the claimed commensurate frailty, the cable only has to pass light, and snap in to the socket securely. It's plenty sturdy for the intended purpose. It's not intended to be used for water skiing, towing cars, or as an anchor line or mooring for a boat. It's not electrically conductive, it's purely optical, it doesn't need decorations such as gold plating or nylon braiding. This cable, with reasonable care, will likely outlast its owner.Ignore the haters, it's a good deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Two 6 ft fiber optic cables for a lower price than one-each of most brands. Very thin, may not be as robust as some thicker cables - but excellent for installations where seldom moved around. Lightweight enough to place very little strain on sockets. Included in the package is an unexpected LED lamp, USB-a connector with a flexy, posable cable. (In a pack of 8, sells for 87-cents each.) It is rather high intensity, don't look directly into the light. Maybe it is included for testing the light transmission of fiber optic cables?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked just like the more expensive ones.
reviews.reviewText: My friend loaned me a much nicer looking cable with swiveled ends while I waiting on mine. Well, when mine arrived and I connected it, there was no difference in audio quality. Inexpensive too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what it supposed to do well
reviews.reviewText: It is very skinny. Be careful not to overbend it.For setups where you plug it in and you leave it alone it is perfect.It is inexpensive and works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Only one cable works
reviews.reviewText: We received these today and tried one and was getting frustrated trying to figure out why it wasn't working. When we switched to the other cable (that was originally for something else), it worked fine. Could just bebad luck on my part, but I don't want to return both cables since one works.
